page.title: 14SCHOOLS IN BARLBY
page.content: Barlby Hilltop School has about 230 children from ages five to eleven.It has eight classes. We have a big grass playing field where we have our sports day. We also have recorder clubs at lunchtimes.We also have a small library in the school.We have one main junior block, an infant block,also one classroom on its own and a dining hall. Barlby Bridge school has about 60 primary children and 48 nursery children (24 in the morning and 24 in the afternoon.There are five teachers for the three primary classes and the Nursery. At the Barlby High School there are about 600 pupils with 37 teaching staff,2 office staff & 3 non_teaching assistants.
